title: Statement by the President on the Philippines | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 19, 2011

 



Statement by the President on the Philippines




On behalf of the American people, I wish to express my deep condolences for the tremendous loss of life and devastation caused by recent flooding in the Philippines.Â  In the spirit of our long history of friendship and cooperation with the Philippines, the United States stands ready to assist the Philippine people and government should humanitarian assistance and recovery efforts be needed.
